Dropdowns

Most pages include a footer at the bottom, which generally contains links as well as legal information regarding copyright.

Guidelines

  • Always Include the Privacy & Data and Terms of Use links.
  • Always Include The Copyright and All Rights Reserved verbiage.
  • There should be no content or space below the footer.
  • There should be at least 60px padding between the footer and the page content above it.

Documentation

Accessibility

In order to be recognizable by the VoiceOver landmark rotor we have to add role="contentinfo" to our footer element.

Convert from UXFrame v1 to v2 with .uxf-2018 Class

  1. Move the a elements within span.footer-legal directly after the last a element inside span.footer-links
  2. Remove .center-footer from div.wrapper-all-except-footer
  3. Change div .wrapper-all-except-footer to div .container-uxf-all-except-footer
  4. Change div .push to div .uxf-push
  5. Change div .footer to div .footer-uxf
  6. Change div .wrapper-container to div .container
  7. Change span.footer-links to ul.footer-links.list-inline.list-unstyled and surround each ul.footer-links > a with a li element
